message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.GT 

This paper discusses the challenges and solutions related to information propagation in blockchain technology, which involves aspects of cryptography (cs.CR), distributed computing (cs.DC), networking and internet architecture (cs.NI), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and game theory (cs.GT). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CR, followed by cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DS, and cs.GT.
